skScriptError Class Reference

This class captures an error that occurs during script execution It can be used in place of an exception handling on platforms such as Windows CE. More...

#include <skScriptError.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

ErrorType getErrorCode () const
 Returns the error code.

skException * getException ()
 Returns the exception associated with the error This can be downcast to a specific exception type.

Detailed Description

This class captures an error that occurs during script execution It can be used in place of an exception handling on platforms such as Windows CE.
